title: U.S. Catholic Profiles Scientists
post: Seems to me that people who suppose there is a conflict between faith and science either don’t have faith or misunderstand of what that faith consists.
author: Andy

title: U.S. Catholic Profiles Scientists
post: Clicking on the February 2015 issue of US Catholic takes you to a subscription form. So one is left wondering who are the five Catholic scientists.
author: Louis
